text: Metropolitan TV Sdn Bhd, operating as 8TV (), is a Malaysian Chinese-language free-to-air television network focused on the Chinese community of Malaysia. It is owned and operated by Media Prima. The channel formerly existed as MetroVision from 1 July 1995 until 1 November 1999 and was relaunched as 8TV on 8 January 2004. ==Programme 8TV== This is a list of television programmes currently, rerunning and formerly on 8TV in Malaysia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:2004 establishments in Malaysia Category:Malaysian culture Category:Television networks
title: 8TV (Malaysian TV network)
